It's not as meaningful to get a compliment from someone who's always nice. In past seasons, you'd see people running out of the[ judging] room saying,` Simon Cowell loved me!' Simon Cowell was always the one people cared about, because he was the hardest one to get. to their red-hot superstars. Allen Iverson made 16-of-22 shots from the field and Karl Malone was 13-for-20. They made every shot in the world, Suns coach Mike D'Antoni said.`` They are hard to handle when Karl Malone and Allen Iverson are coming at you like that. They are hard to handle on any night.''
